div.span:
PM Intervention
- react to issues flagged
- assign issue_budget when PM sees an issue valid
- approve to release issue_budget when issue and pull_request match, all conditions comply

search_issues_open
- record new issues meeting all project conditions

search_issues_w_update_comments
- identify issues with potential problems by filtering comments with AI
- flag them in db if found

search_issues_closed
- record issues with closed status
- flag them in db, ready for PM review

search_pull_requests
- record pull_requests meeting all project conditions
- match pull_requests with issues in db
